column14: Dove Body Love Age Embrace Body Cleanser

column31:
? Made with peptide serum and pure glycerin 
? Helps reduce roughness and visibly rejuvenate skin
? Formulated with our unique 10X Moisture Boost Complex* 
? Formula that?s sulfate and paraben free 
? #1 dermatologist recommended body wash brand
column32:
Dove believes the skin on our bodies deserves the same level of care we give our faces. Say hello to Body Love, a range of premium body cleansers to make your body smile. 

Dove Body Love Age Embrace Body Cleanser is formulated to visibly reduce roughness and rejuvenate skin. It locks in moisture for a more hydrated skin barrier, encouraging more supple, firmer-looking skin that feels truly loved. 
 
This beautifully rich and indulgent body cleanser is formulated with ingredients like peptide serum and pure glycerin. Our unique 10X Moisture Boost Complex* contains a mix of active moisturizers to deliver extra care and hydration. Plus, the fresh, floral fragrance will leave your skin delicately scented, with notes of jasmine, blood orange and coconut. 

Dove Body Love Age Embrace Body Cleanser is made with naturally-derived, gentle skin cleansers. A sulfate and paraben-free body cleanser, it?s also PETA-certified cruelty-free and made in 100% recycled plastic bottles.
 

*10X the moisturizers of the next leading body wash
column33:
? Maturing skin
Our Body Love Age Embrace Body Cleanser helps you show your body some love. Thoughtfully formulated, it?s made with ingredients you know and love like pure glycerin and peptides for skin that needs a little extra care and attention. 

? Your Age Embrace regimen 
Give your skin the care it deserves. Rinse off and cleanse with Dove Body Love Age Embrace Body Cleanser for rejuvenated, moisturized skin. 

? Showing your body some love 
Many of us spend time and effort on multi-step face care regimens. We believe your body deserves just as much love. Dove Body Love is going to change the way you think about your body care, formulated with ingredients to nourish your skin and show your body some TLC.
column34: Double down on hydration and care for mature skin in the shower with our Age Embrace cleansing regimen. Massage a pump of cleanser between your hands and apply to wet skin all over, before rinsing off with water. The luxurious, lotion-like formula is made with peptide serum and pure glycerin for skin that feels hydrated and cared for.
column35: Give your skin the care it deserves and try the silky, buttery texture works into a rich lather to give your body an extra dose of hydration, leaving you with lasting softness and beautifully smooth skin.
column36: Ingredients correct at time of publishing. Always check product packaging.

column32:
Your skin deserves some TLC whether it be  day or night, and Dove Night Recovery Body Polish is the perfect way to shower your body with the care it deserves. Our nourishing exfoliating body polish formula with retinol serum + exfoliants buffs away dead skin cells, and refines, and preps the skin barrier. 

Formulated with 10x moisture boost*, this exfoliating body polish for dry, worn-down skin will gently exfoliate skin and infuse moisture so, you can wake up to beautifully renewed skin. 

A sulfate and paraben-free body cleanser, Dove Night Recovery Body Polish is vegan, and Dove is globally approved by PETA. What?s even better? Our bottles are made in 100% recycled plastic bottles.

No.1 dermatologist-recommended body wash brand and co-created with beauty editors
column33:
Extra care for dry skin 
Formulated for dry and worn-down skin in need of a little extra love and long-lasting softness.
column34: Massage a generous amount of this body polish on skin and leave on for one minute to infuse moisture. Rinse and follow with the Dove Body Love Cleanser to lock in moisture.
column35: Try switching your ordinary soap or non-moisturizing body wash for a body wash or scrub with retinol serum.

column32:
Give your skin a spa-like treatment in the shower and the care it deserves with Dove Body Love Exfoliate Away Body Cleanser.

This exfoliating body wash formulated with AHA serum and exfoliating minerals is ideal for rough, bumpy skin. Made with a blend of active moisturizers, it promotes surface skin cell turnover. It?s creamy and exfoliating texture with a bubbly lather, retexturizes your skin while keeping it hydrated throughout the day. 

A sulfate and paraben-free body cleanser, our body cleanser is also vegan, and Dove is globally approved by PETA. What?s even better? Our bottle is made with 100% recycled plastic.

No.1 dermatologist-recommended body wash brand and co-created with beauty editors.
column33:
Rough and bumpy skin
Our exfoliating body wash with AHA serum and exfoliating minerals is ideal for rough, bumpy skin. Made with a blend of active moisturizers, it promotes surface skin cell turnover leaving your skin feeling hydrated, soft and beautifully nourished.
column34: Squeeze a generous amount of Dove Exfoliate Away body cleanser into your palms. Massage on your skin and experience the premium spa-inspired fragrance and the exfoliating mineral-rich formula transform into a bubbly, creamy lather.
column35: A non-moisturizing body wash can the leave skin feeling dry post-shower. Try switching your regular cleanser for Dove Body Love Exfoliate Away Body Cleanser with AHA serum.

column32:
Ready to shower your body with love? Boost your skin?s moisture barrier and resilience with Dove Night Recovery Body Cleanser formulated with 10X Moisture Boost Complex* comprised of active moisturizers, this body soap cleanser for dry worn-down skin has a rich and creamy texture that helps skin stay hydrated throughout the night for softer, smoother skin in the morning. This moisturizing cleanser helps to boost skins resilience while nourishing dry skin. 

Formulated with retinol serum and botanical oils, this cleanser helps to retain moisture, boosts the skin?s resilience, while nourishing dry skin.  
It also encourages the production of skin?s natural moisturizers, not only while you sleep, but also leaves you with a softness that lasts 24 hours. Plus, it will leave your skin delicately scented with soothing notes of Jasmine, maple, vanilla, and amber.  

A paraben and sulfate-free cleanser, it?s also as gentle as water. Dove Night Recovery Body Cleanser is vegan, and Dove is globally approved by PETA.  

No.1 dermatologist-recommended body wash brand and co-created with beauty editors.
